Post.title: JekyllGitHub Pages
Post._content:
## JekyllGitHub Pages

## JeKyll

[JeKyll](https://jekyllrb.com)Ruby

> JekyllURL

### JeKyll

1. [Ruby](https://jekyllrb.com/docs/installation/) ([macOS ](https://jekyllrb.com/docs/installation/macos/)) ***macOS Mojave 10.14 ***

   1.1 HomebrewRuby

    ``` bash
    # Install Homebrew
    /usr/bin/ruby -e "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/master/install)"

    brew install ruby
    ```
   1.2 Ruby

    ``` bash
    echo 'export PATH=/usr/local/opt/ruby/bin:$PATH' >> ~/.zshrc
    ```

   1.3 Ruby

    ``` bash
    which ruby
    /usr/local/opt/ruby/bin/ruby
    ruby -v
    ruby 2.6.0p0 (2018-12-25 revision 66547) [x86_64-darwin18]
    ```
2. jekyll

    ``` bash
    gem install --user-install bundler jekyll
    ```
3.  Jekyll

    ``` bash
    jekyll new myblog
    ```
     *command not found: jekyll* gemPATH

4. 

   ``` bash
   cd myblog
   bundle exec jekyll serve
   ```

   [http://localhost:4000/](http://localhost:4000/)

## GitHub Pages

[GitHub Pages](https://pages.github.com/)GitHub

### GitHub Pages

1.    
  [GitHUb](https://github.com/)   *username.github.io* *username*GitHub

2.   
   

   ``` bash

   git clone https://github.com/username/username.github.io
   ```

3.   
   index.html

   ``` bash

   cd username.github.io
   echo "Hello World" > index.html
   ```

4.   
   

   ``` bash

   git add --all
   git commit -m ""
   git push -u origin master
   ```

5.   
   [*https://username.github.io*](https://username.github.io)

## 

 Jekyllusername.github.io GitHub

``` bash
 cp -r myblog/** username.github.io
```

Jekyll

Post.title: Linuxnode
Post._content:
Linux 64node  

1 [](https://nodejs.org/dist/v10.15.0/node-v10.15.0-linux-x64.tar.xz)scp

``` bash
scp -r ~/Downloads/node-v10.15.0-linux-x64.tar.xz user@host:path
```

2Node/usr/ local/lib/nodejs

``` bash
VERSION=v10.15.0
DISTRO=linux-x64
sudo mkdir /usr/local/lib/nodejs
sudo tar -xJvf node-$VERSION-$DISTRO.tar.xz -C /usr/local/lib/nodejs
sudo mv /usr/local/lib/nodejs/node-$VERSION-$DISTRO /usr/local/lib/nodejs/node-$VERSION
```

3vim /etc/profile 

``` bash
# Nodejs
export NODEJS_HOME=/usr/local/lib/nodejs/node-$VERSION/bin
export PATH=$NODEJS_HOME:$PATH
```

4

``` bash
. /etc/profile
```

5

``` bash
node -v
npm version
npx -v
```



``` bash
node -v
v10.15.0
npm version
{ npm: '6.4.1',
  ares: '1.15.0',
  cldr: '33.1',
  http_parser: '2.8.0',
  icu: '62.1',
  modules: '64',
  napi: '3',
  nghttp2: '1.34.0',
  node: '10.15.0',
  openssl: '1.1.0j',
  tz: '2018e',
  unicode: '11.0',
  uv: '1.23.2',
  v8: '6.8.275.32-node.45',
  zlib: '1.2.11' }
```

sudo

``` bash
sudo ln -s /usr/local/lib/nodejs/node-$VERSION/bin/node /usr/bin/node

sudo ln -s /usr/local/lib/nodejs/node-$VERSION/bin/npm /usr/bin/npm

sudo ln -s /usr/local/lib/nodejs/node-$VERSION/bin/npx /usr/bin/npx
```

## yarn

1. [](https://yarnpkg.com/latest.tar.gz)
   
   ``` bash
   scp -r ~/Downloads/yarn-v1.12.3.tar.gz user@host:path
   ```
2. 
   
   ``` bash
   tar zvxf yarn-v1.12.3.tar.gz -C /opt
   ```
3. vim /etc/profile 
   
   ``` bash
   export NODEJS_HOME=/opt/yarn-v1.12.3/bin
   export PATH=$NODEJS_HOME:$PATH
   ```
4. 

   ``` bash
   . /etc/profile
   ```
5.  Yarn 

   ``` bash
   yarn --version
   ```
## 

yarn config
   
``` bash
yarn config set yarn-offline-mirror ./npm-packages-offline-cache
```

./npm-packages-offline-cachesource.tar.gz

tar

``` bash
yarn config set yarn-offline-mirror-pruning true
```


* yarn cache clean
* wifi
* yarn install -offlineyarn



* yarn-offline-mirror.yarnrc
* yarn installyarn.lock

Post.title: Linuxjenkins
Post._content:
## centosyumjenkinswar

## 

1. JDK

   ``` bash
   yum install -y java
   ```

2. Jenkins

   ``` bash
   # wgetcurl
   yum install -y wget

   # Jenkinsyum
   wget -O /etc/yum.repos.d/jenkins.repo http://pkg.jenkins-ci.org/redhat/jenkins.repo

   rpm --import https://jenkins-ci.org/redhat/jenkins-ci.org.key

   yum install -y jenkins
   ```

3. Jenkins

   ``` bash
   # Jenkins
   service jenkins start

   # Jenkins
   service jenkins stop

   # Jenkins
   service jenkins restart
   ```

4. 

   Jenkins8080Jenkins

   ``` bash
   # Jenkis JENKINS_PORT="8080"
   vi /etc/sysconfig/jenkins

   # 
   firewall-cmd --zone=public --add-port=8080/tcp --permanent

   # Jenkins
   service jenkins restart
   ```

## 

1. warscp

   ``` bash
   cp ~/Downloads/jenkins.war user@ip:/usr/lib/jenkins/
   ```

2. Jenkins

   ``` bash
   # /usr/lib/jenkins/jenkins.war
   ps -ef | grep jenkins

   # warJenkins
   service jenkins stop
   service jenkins start
   ```

## centosyumjenkinswar

## 

1. JDK

   ``` bash
   yum install -y java
   ```

2. Jenkins

   ``` bash
   # wgetcurl
   yum install -y wget

   # Jenkinsyum
   wget -O /etc/yum.repos.d/jenkins.repo http://pkg.jenkins-ci.org/redhat/jenkins.repo

   rpm --import https://jenkins-ci.org/redhat/jenkins-ci.org.key

   yum install -y jenkins
   ```

3. Jenkins

   ``` bash
   # Jenkins
   service jenkins start

   # Jenkins
   service jenkins stop

   # Jenkins
   service jenkins restart
   ```

4. 

   Jenkins8080Jenkins

   ``` bash
   # Jenkis JENKINS_PORT="8080"
   vi /etc/sysconfig/jenkins

   # 
   firewall-cmd --zone=public --add-port=8080/tcp --permanent

   # Jenkins
   service jenkins restart
   ```

## 

1. warscp

   ``` bash
   cp ~/Downloads/jenkins.war user@ip:/usr/lib/jenkins/
   ```

2. Jenkins

   ``` bash
   # /usr/lib/jenkins/jenkins.war
   ps -ef | grep jenkins

   # warJenkins
   service jenkins stop
   service jenkins start
   ```

CAS CASCAS CASCASSAMLOAuthCASCAS

* .NET ([.NET CAS Client](https://github.com/apereo/dotnet-cas-client))
* PHP (phpCAS)
* Perl (PerlCAS)
* Python (pycas)
* Ruby (rubycas-client)



* Outlook Web Application (ClearPass + .NET CAS Client)
* Atlassian Confluence
* Atlassian JIRA
* Drupal
* Liferay
* uPortal

# 20190130JekyllHexo

Post.title: LinuxMongoDB
Post._content:
## Red Hat EnterpriseCentOS LinuxMongoDB 

.rpmRed Hat Enterprise LinuxCentOS Linux67MongoDB Community Edition

### .rpm

1. yum

  /etc/yum.repos.d/mongodb-org-4.0.repoyumMongoDB

  ``` bash
  [mongodb-org-4.0]
  name=MongoDB Repository
  baseurl=https://repo.mongodb.org/yum/redhat/$releasever/mongodb-org/4.0/x86_64/
  gpgcheck=1
  enabled=1
  gpgkey=https://www.mongodb.org/static/pgp/server-4.0.asc
  ```

2. MongoDB

  MongoDB

  ``` bash
  sudo yum install -y mongodb-org
  ```
  
### MongoDB

1. MongoDB

  mongod

  ``` bash
  sudo service mongod start
  ```
    
2. MongoDB

  /var/log/mongodb/mongod.logmongod
  
  ``` bash
  [initandlisten] waiting for connections on port <port>
  ```
  
  <port>/etc/mongod.conf27017
  
  MongoDB
  
  ``` bash
  sudo chkconfig mongod on
  ```

3. MongoDB

  mongod
  
  ``` bash
  sudo service mongod stop
  ```
  
4. MongoDB

  mongod
  
  ``` bash
  sudo service mongod restart
  ```
  
  /var/log/mongodb/mongod.log
  
5. MongoDB

  mongodmongo shellmongo shell27017localhostmongod
  
  ``` bash
  mongo
  ```
